issue.title: [Release] Dockerize post-03-website.sh script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6014](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6014). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The script fails on OSX because of the BSD date function, and it also requires a recent git command to support -c flag of git shortlog and the installed jira python client.
